name: Whatâ€™s there to Drink?
description: A simple web application that displays one random cocktail at a time with the ingredients and preparation information for a fun night - using The Cocktail DB API.

name: Polynomials App
description: An app that allows a user to view a list of common polynomial functions, view an individual function and information on that function. Then the user will be able to create a new comment, update their existing comment, and delete a comment - all on the show page of each polynomial.
